Generation V.Black: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
Generation V.White: They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot a poisonous liquid from their right-hand fingertips.
Generation V.Black 2: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
Generation V.White 2: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

Generation VI.X: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
Generation VI.Y: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

Generation VII.Sun: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you'll experience the effects of the unidentified toxin.
Generation VII.Moon: For a time, their numbers increased explosively in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer, their population has decreased dramatically.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It locks opponents in place with its left hand, immobilizing them by entirely dousing their bodies with poisonous liquid.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Some say the reason Garbodor in Alola are a little stronger than their counterparts elsewhere is the presence of Muk, their natural enemy.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
Generation VIII.Shield: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.

Generation VI.X: Lost Hotel , Pokémon Village (trash cans), Friend Safari ( Poison )
Generation VI.Y: Lost Hotel , Pokémon Village (trash cans), Friend Safari ( Poison )

Generation VIII.Shield: Lake of Outrage , East Lake Axewell East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Motostoke Riverbank , Giant's Cap ( Max Raid Battle ) East Lake Axewell ( Max Raid Battle ) ( Gigantamax Factor )
